title: Ferocity
description: This short 18,500 word novella is intended to read alongside the Heart of Stone books but after Endurance.Sometimes, love is just that little bit too cruel.Trouble. There it is again, smack bang in the middle of the Fox’s lives once more. Mason and Ava Fox are back in town when family problems demand their return. History has a cruel way of repeating itself and Ava and Mason soon find out just how true that statement is when old faces, old habits and prior events echo into the present.But when tragedy strikes, the Fox’s find that nothing but their all will suffice in bringing down the person who claimed the life of their deeply loved friend.Grief can manifest itself in many ways and for Ava, there’s only one way to deal with hers. Revenge.Mercilessly and with ferocity.But has the feisty heroine taken on too much this time? And can Mason get there in time to save his little warrior once again?This novella contains explicit sex scenes, strong language and violence… oh, and one hell of a tough couple.
author: D.H. Sidebottom
